DOC.brief_summary: The purpose evaluate efficacy safety therapeutic hepatitis B virus ( HBV ) vaccine ( synthesized peptide ) Joint entecavir treatment chronic hepatitis B patient .
DOC.brief_title: Therapeutic Hepatitis B Vaccine ( Synthesized Peptide εPA-44 ) Joint Entecavir Treating Chronic Hepatitis B Patients
DOC.detailed_description: Eligible subject enrol assigned 2 group randomly 1:1 ratio： 1 . Therapeutic HBV vaccine Joint Entecavir group：Inject εPA-44 900μg week 0 , 3 , 6 , 9 , 12 , 15 , 18 , 21 , 24 , 28 , 32 , 36 , 40 , 44 , 48 + Oral intake entecavir 0.5mg per day ； 2 . Empty liposome Joint Entecavir group：Inject empty liposome 900μg week 0 , 3 , 6 , 9 , 12 , 15 , 18 , 21 , 24 , 28 , 32 , 36 , 40 , 44 , 48 + Oral intake entecavir 0.5mg per day . The study cycle consist screen enrollment period ( week -4～0 ) , treatment follow-up period ( week 0-96 ) .
